name: Black Dice
description:
Made for the gmtk jam 2022.

Use your cards to extinguish the moon.
Cards cost either MAGIC or HEALTH - and their effect is dictated by the sum total of your black dice.
For example a card with a SWORD will deal 8 damage to the moon if you have a 6 & 2 dice!

Game Dev YOUTUBE channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/Blackthornprod/videos
